Show / Hide Table of Contents

Namespace Celestial.UIToolkit.Converters

Classes

BooleanToVisibilityConverter

A value converter which converts a Boolean to a Visibility value, depending on whether the object is true or false.

ColorToSolidColorBrushConverter

A converter which converts Color objects to SolidColorBrush objects and vice versa.

DoubleToCornerRadiusConverter

A converter which converts a double value to a CornerRadius instance with uniform values.

GetTypeConverter

A value converter which returns the Type of an input object.

GroupConverter

An implementation of the IValueConverter interface which bundles other IValueConverter instances and uses these in order to convert an object.

InvertBooleanConverter

A value converter which inverts a given Boolean value.

InvertingConverter

An implementation of the IValueConverter interface which uses another IValueConverter specified via the UnderlyingConverter property to convert values, but in an inverted way.

In the Convert(Object, Type, Object, CultureInfo) method, the underlying converter's ConvertBack(Object, Type, Object, CultureInfo) method is called. Likewise, in the ConvertBack(Object, Type, Object, CultureInfo) method, the underlying converter's Convert(Object, Type, Object, CultureInfo) is called.

MathOperationConverter

A converter which performs the most basic mathematical operations between two values.

NegateValueConverter

An implementation of the IValueConverter interface which negates the input variable, if possible. This works on numbers and a few WPF types like Thickness.

NullToVisibilityConverter

A value converter which converts any object to a Visibility value, depending on whether the object is null or not.

StringToVisibilityConverter

An extension of the NullToVisibilityConverter, which also includes a null-string check in the conversion.

ThicknessSidePickerConverter

An implementation of the IValueConverter interface which expects a Thickness, sets certain edge properties to a desired value and then returns the result.

ValueConverter<TValue, TTarget>

A strongly-typed base class for converters which implement the IValueConverter interface.

Enums

MathOperator

Defines the supported mathematical operations which are used by the MathOperationConverter.
